name: Light of Valkyrie
description:
《Light of Valkyrie》 is a high-definition 3D real interactive MMO role-playing game.
There are a variety of careers for players, such as knights, warriors, and hunters.

Game features:
Players slowly become familiar with the game through the epic quest line
Players can experience a variety of pve games such as treasure caves, dungeons and monster invasions.
You can also provide players with the pleasure of pvp battle through real-time game content such as arena, battlefield and war temple.

Different career options offer players a different skill set. Players can unlock gorgeous skills and excellent talent trees by increasing the level of the game character. Players collect different monster cards to activate and acquire small pets, and cute little pets can carry them.

Want to experience an epic plot? Want to experience a sweaty back fight? Come join this adventure.
《Light of Valkyrie》 is in the middle of the game world.
